description:
Automatically disable other pointing devices when an external mouse is plugged in. 
Optionally, switch the touchpad, trackpoint, fingertouch, touchscreen or a pen device on and off easily from the top panel.

TouchpadIndicator-extensions.gnome.org-v31
Supports GNOME Shell 3.30 and below. See GitHub for list of known issues.

(For GNOME Shell 3.32, see: https://github.com/user501254/TouchpadIndicator/issues/35#issuecomment-486425301)
name: Touchpad Indicator
